document.full_text: barrick gold corp   has agreed to buy equinox minerals   for about c$7.3 billion ($7.68 billion), topping a bid from china's minmetals resources  in a big bet on soaring copper demand.
document.title: barrick's $7.68 billion equinox bid tops minmetals
lines_and_colors: barrick gold corp   has agreed to buy equinox minerals   for about c$7.3 billion ($7.68 billion), topping a bid from china's minmetals resources  in a big bet on soaring copper demand.
